website_summaries.verdict: The affordable, exercise-oriented SOL Republic Relays are value-priced earphones that offers intense low-end for bass lovers.
pros: Powerful audio performance with intense deep bass
Lightweight, secure-fitting design geared towards exercise
cons: Highly sculpted sound signature isn't for purists

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product - Only Buy It From An Authorized Dealer!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, after 2 months of regular use @ the gym, the left side earbud began to crackle at all volumes. Shame, the sound quality was good until then, and there is no way this should have happened so soon. After 3 emails to Sol Republic, they agreed to replace the product and also explained their warranty policy. WARNING to all potential purchasers: A Sol Republic representative said they will not honor the warranty policy if the product is purchased from an "UNAUTHORIZED" dealer. Thus, before you buy and get what seems to be a good price, make sure the seller is actually an "AUTHORIZED" dealer or you are out of luck!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: They worked well for 17 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April 2015 for $57 and have used them often to listen to audiobooks and music on my iPhone. They sound OK and are reasonably comfortable. Today when I plugged them in, sound was only coming out of the left earphone. I am bummed because I thought the L-shaped headphone plug would last longer than a straight one, but the iLuv iep515 earphones I bought at the same time with a straight plug are still working. So I got 17 months out of them. $57 is more than I want to pay for a product that breaks in less than two years, but I would buy them again at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Stef Maruch

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, lasted less than two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and quality of sound were great at first, worth at least 4 or 5 stars considering I have a horrible time purchasing headphones that actually fit. However, in less than 2 weeks the right headphone has already started issuing static and its volume has gone down dramatically. It's significant enough that I don't bother using the right side any more. I've contacted SOL REPUBLIC requesting a refund or replacement but their site says to expect 2-3 weeks for a response to the request, let alone actually receiving any kind of compensation however I'll update this review once and if they respond.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bear McBear

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these headphones. They will not last whatsoever. I did quite a bit of research on these headphones and thought that they would be good (they have good sound quality, etc.), but the left ear bud suddenly stopped working one day after about 7 months of use. I was merely walking to class when this happened, so there was no strenuous activity, rough contact with the headphones, or any sweat/water involved. I follow all directions provided in the warranty/directions manual in terms of storage and care.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: OK quality but short-lived
customer_reviews.text: For the application I intended them for, sound quality was not an issue. It was acceptable. And the low profile worked well--they lay flat in my ears and nothing stuck out. However, the casing that holds the wires and electronics in place is hard plastic. One of the casings broke, and the guts of the ear bud are now falling out. The break cannot be repaired, and now, 5 months after purchasing these, I will have to replace them--with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: PsychReader

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these upon the recommendation of Wirecutter as the best sports headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these upon the recommendation of Wirecutter as the best sports headphones, and for the most part they have worked as advertised: they can deal with abuse and sweat, they are adequate in sound quality, and they work well with my Apple device. Where these fall short: the microphone is terrible. More often than not, people complain they can barely hear me and I have to hold the microphone directly in front of my mouth. I have owned these for almost a year and have used them regularly with great care, this has always been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dumbledore Calrissian

customer_reviews.title: A great stay-put set of buds!
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are great! I dj and was looking for a earbud alternative to larger headphones to cue music, and these stay in great and serve that purpose well! Great sounding as well as an awesome stay-put design. And they isolate from outside noise a lot! I'm already thinking about getting another set. Update- 2/3/17. From my experience with many types of earbuds, as a dj and not into exercise, you cannot beat the secure fit that these provide. If your main need is for earbuds, not a microphone for your phone, get these!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Dark Side

customer_reviews.title: Three defective pairs in a row
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the first pair had one earbud stop working a few months after purchase. I requested a replacement and their warranty service was great. However, just two months later the warranty replacement had the exact same problem. Sent a third pair, and it had the same problem within ONE WEEK. There is no damage at all, but I can tell there's a loose/defective wire because the sound cuts in and out when the wire moves around. Terrible quality and I would not recommend this product. Would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ed BTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but fizzled out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the strength of reviews. I work out a lot and I sweat a lot. I usually spend $20 on headphones and am happy if they last six months before they get broken (olympic lifts) or they fizzle out (sweat and a rough environment, like running in the rain). i spent several times as much money on these headphones, and they lasted, what, two or three months? don't bother. if you really care about decent sound and resilient headphones, skip these. buy less-expensive pairs with an easy return like the ones offered by skullcandy.
customer_reviews.author: noah thingortoo

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: The left bud fit perfectly in my ear while the right one was uncomfortable a lot of the times. Unfortunately, after about a month of using it, the left ear bud stopped working. For the price I got it for, I a very unsatisfied and would not get this again. The only thing that would have been a redeeming quality was that the cord was longer than what I usually can find, which I like, and the sound was better than the $10-20 pairs I usually get. Doesn't really help much though if I can only hear in one ear.
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ears
customer_reviews.text: Totally personal review here as the reason I'm giving it such a bad review was that the little rings around the ear cups were so stiff! I could only ever wear these earphones for maybe an hour before my ears were super painful and red. The rings meant to hold the earphone in place ended up just denting the inside cartilage of each of my ear canals and it would be hours before they would return to normal. Also, just a note, I am a woman with a smaller ear canal.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality headphones. I've owned them for over one year, however, they were used less than 50 times. I only use them for particular workouts. Left side began to fail after 30 or so uses. Now the left side does not work at all. Sound is Ok, good enough for my needs for workouts. However, I have an issue with the built-in controls, they allow you to volume up and down, pause, and play, however you can't skip tracks. This is frustrating during a workout as you could imagine. I would like to return these for a refund, however, I am outside of the return and warranty period. Lesson learned on these.
customer_reviews.author: Jdub

customer_reviews.title: The Wirecutter recommended these headphones as the best exercise headphones
customer_reviews.text: The Wirecutter recommended these headphones as the best exercise headphones. And they were right, these are great. The only complaint is what I have about all "in ear" models -- they end up blocking some of the outside noise. Unlike other in-ear earbuds, these have the big "ring" that sits inside my ear - held in place by the tragus - which helps keep them in place without having to shove them deep in my ear canal (which I hate)
customer_reviews.author: hellimedic

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product was great. The design allowed the headphones to sit properly in my ears, whereas most other headphones do not. I used them at the gym for about 3-5x a week for 6 months and they just broke on me. The sound no longer comes out of one headphone. So if you're willing to by a new pair every 6 months you will love the product. However, if you don't want to keep dropping over $50 every 6 months on headphones I suggest you go for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mario

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Comfort AMAZING! Durability not so much..
customer_reviews.text: I boight these ear buds to use while I run. They stay in the ear quite nicely with almost no need for adjustments. The sound quality and comfort of these ear buds are absolutely awesome! The durability however is not as good as you would hope for a product with this price tag. After just a few months of relatively light use the left ear bud has stopped working. Even though the comfort and sound quality are great I would recommend buying a different pair of ear buds due to the durability not being on par with the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Gillard Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The product was poorly made, one of the headphone speakers blew out SO quickly. Their customer service was A+++++ they did in turn give us a certificate for the same amount as the item. However, we had to use it on their website, so we were actually out of pocket for more.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for the gym, and even better for the price (as of today 8/31/14), I think they are now $60 on Amazon. I've only had them for a few weeks, but so far so good. The claims of being sweatproof seem to hold up so far (after 15+ uses at the gym). The sound is great considering the price and the fact that these are built for the wear and tear of use at the gym, in addition to having a functioning remote. The microphone hasn't been great, but again I bought these for the gym and exercise, not to make calls.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D.

customer_reviews.title: The buttons aren't easy to press
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove the red, silicone ring from the middle of these headphones because they didn't fit my ears otherwise. The buttons aren't easy to press, especially if you are wearing any type of gloves. The 90 degree jack is nice. I'd give the sound quality 8/10.
customer_reviews.author: WillGEB

customer_reviews.title: Sol Republic 1131-31 Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I needed a headset or earphones loud enough to be able to listen to my music while riding in the back of a diveboat running it's diesel engine at top speed. I tried several different bluetooth headsets without success. Finally I found this unit and it works great. The design is such that it feels very secure in my ear as well. I have a Samsung S5 so the volume buttons don't work but I don't miss it. I definetly would repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ljh2

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was excellent for in ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was excellent for in ear headphones. Unfortunately I have had a really hard time finding a pair of earphones that can stay in my ears while running. These were advertised to perform well and stay in, however mine fell out at least once on each run over a month of running 3-5 times per week. Still searching for in ear phones that will not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Greene

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are awesome. I've had several pairs of headphones that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. I've had several pairs of headphones that I've tried to make work gym duty. The last pair I had were kickers and they worked pretty well up until they died from exposure to sweat. Well, I've had these for quite a while now, and I think I can say that sweat is no problem for them. Not only that, but they sound great, fit great in my ear, and they have a remote on the cord so I don't have to pull my phone out to change track or volume.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with the performace
customer_reviews.text: Have had them a month and they have worked very well on 40+ min runs and 90 min spin classes. Even with high temps and a lot of sweat they stay in place! If you are going to toss in your gym bag I would recommend some type of case to protect them rather than the little fabric pouch that comes with it, but the product is solid! Can't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Atherton

customer_reviews.title: great product... while it lasts.  don't count on customer support.
customer_reviews.text: excellent product for the first 3 months, then the left earbud stopped working. opened a case with sol republic... no response. second try, oooh! i got an automated email back with a case number! then days go by. i reply back asking for status on my case. so, i'm on week 3 now since i've opened my second case. product is still under warranty, but i honestly believe the company does not have a customer support org. so far, my impression of the product is great sound, but not sturdy; of course i could have gotten a defective one, but i'll never know since i'm not going to buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: sang yi

customer_reviews.title: Not happy here ....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in August of 2014. It is now January of 2015. TODAY, IN THE MIDST of listening to music via these earbuds, suddenly there was NO MUSIC in the left earbud. (Plugged in another set of earbuds .... no problem - plenty of music) Don't know why this happened, have not contacted Sol Republic, but for an $80 price tag, I would certainly expect to get more than 5 MONTHS of use from this product. Perhaps that explains why the price has now dropped?? Don't buy these earbuds at least until I hear from Sol Republic, if that ever happens. NOT happy with this purchase :-((((
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loved them and a fan of sol republic myself although they didn’t last 2 month before one side of the earphones gave out of sound. The sound quality is always great as expected from Sol but the build quality could need some help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased these headphones twice and they both started to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these headphones twice and they both started to far apart within 3 months. Though they are comfy and sound decent, but they are definitely not worth the original $80 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: not great. Fit is fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 1 year and 2 weeks ago. I used them only when I went for a walk (avg about twice a week). Sound is decent, not great. Fit is fine. I would give them 3 stars, if one of the ear buds didn't just die 2 weeks out of warranty. I was wearing them - didn't touch any part of them - and one just quit working. I jiggled them, checked to see if there was a visible issue with the cords (there isn't), but no help.
customer_reviews.author: Zevon

customer_reviews.title: These little headphones are great. They stay in my ears while running and ...
customer_reviews.text: These little headphones are great. They stay in my ears while running and mountain biking. They seem to be sweat resistant and quite durable. My only complaint is that they really are sound isolating, so don't wear them if you need to be aware of outside noise. Also, these headphones don't have the deepest bass, if that's you're thing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: ... in-ear set I ever had where it didn't feel like it had a ten pound weight on the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: The first in-ear set I ever had where it didn't feel like it had a ten pound weight on the outside constantly prompting them to fall out. Hardly ever had to readjust them after inserting them. The sound emulated Beats and I would assume other "high-end" brands without the outrageous cost. I've bought the in-ear Beats before and the power Beats and both blew out within two months (I'm a heavy user... but still). The SOL is going on its third and shows no sign of wearing. Definitely not shelling out $150 for the "high-end" stuff that falls out all the time and breaks easily ever again, these are the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Garrette S.

customer_reviews.title: Comply makes it the best fit ever.
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one of the better brands that fit secure and have some better quality sound, not loud like headphones, but it's the best earbuds for everyone, just because it costs more doesn't mean it is better. Wireless works great too!!! 2 pairs of those. Say no to beats!
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I do like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I do like these headphones, and the only limitations that I have found so far is the less than desired bass sound. Also, I may be just getting used to the headphones, but I do have to adjust every once in a while to avoid any discomfort. That said, they do stay on during workouts even when lifting and running. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Button works with Windows Phone 8.1
customer_reviews.text: these fit my ears well and can be used for fitness activities, unlike other earbuds which I'm partial to, rather than on-ear or over-ear headphones. The 1-button control works with Windows Phone 8.1 in terms of on/off, at least for the FM Radio app. I wish the cable was a bit softer as it is rather stiff for wrapping around for storage. But overall, love these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of garbage. I just pulled them out of the package & the left earbud barely has any sound. I even paid extra to have them delivered quickly. I’ll definitely be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter42

customer_reviews.title: Poor soldering, remote/earbud fails after a few times of use
customer_reviews.text: I use these for running/working out at the gym. I've owned them for about a month and half and have used them about 15 different times for various lengths of time... the left earbud no longer works (it is the left earbud that has the remote in the line) - seems to be poor soldering inside the remote. Trying to figure out how to get a replacement and/or my money back as I've only had them about 50 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were actually nice but I had an issue with them due to the mesh on an earbud collapsing. I contacted their customer service and have been ignored. These are not 10 dollar earbuds so the lack of customer service is disappointing. I would not buy again just because of that
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. Unfortunately the most recent order I placed for them came in broken. Still giving it 5 stars because when they do work, they provide great sound and fit comfortably. On a side note, the Amazon return was quick and easy and I had my refund in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Sits well, sounds so-so
customer_reviews.text: The major selling point for those earbuds is that when it comes to staying in the ear when working out, they win against any in-ear product, hands down. The are fairly comfortable, and well designed. However, given the price tag, the sound quality is mediocre, on both ends of the spectrum. Still, I consider it a respectable buy given that I wear them almost exclusively when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Lucius Verus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound quality and decent fit but there seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound quality and decent fit but there seems to be a problem with the headphone jack. I use an Ipod Shuffle at the gym and these headphones stopped working with the device after 7 months of use. The headphones still work with other devices but with the Shuffle they cut out and are not recognized as being plugged in. I originally thought this was a problem with my old Shuffle and even bought a new one (I like these headphones) but experienced the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought these not to long ago and they sounded fine at first. Now they sound terrible and very staticky. Would not recommend. I have to now get a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Harding

customer_reviews.title: they slide out too easily. lasted during running
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me 2 years, went through the washer and still worked months afterwards. Clip broke, but headphones still work. They stay in ear, but have to adjust often. Without clip, they slide out too easily. lasted during running, gym, and cross fit exercises. Would recommend if you dont like over ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star review as I love the fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: Almost a 5 star review as I love the fit and sound. The bass response is slightly less than I have heard in other earphones, however the fit is superior and they stay in place in all situations. Two issues have prevented the 5 star review 1. The volume buttons do not work on my new HTC M8 Android phone, 2. The 3.5mm does not like to stay solid in the same phone's 3.5mm port, frequently cutting off sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great for exercise
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for exercise. They are small, lightweight, fits in the ear very well. The sound quality is well balanced, perhaps a tad bit on the bass heavy side, but by no means excessive. After several months of use at the gym, I've had no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as everyone say.
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of reviews I believed these would be the greatest workout headphones. They have a lot of cable noise and the rings that hold them in your ear are stiffer than expected. I use them at my desk at work if I need to but I can't wear them a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fake Name

customer_reviews.title: Good while they last
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and staying power of these headphones but they are super fragile. Mine are about 4 months old and the sound in the right ear just disappeared. No external damage and no activity more severe than a half-marathon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Ok headphones
customer_reviews.text: The Sol Republic Relays hold well with a few ear canal fit problems, perhaps a change to the shape of the ear tips may help fitting, make them thicker but softer and perhaps a slight ellipsoidal shape. The sound is slightly muddy, bass is good, I have listened to clearer headphones in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M

customer_reviews.title: Great, until they broke after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 4 months ago and they have already broken. The headphones still work but the buttons and the mic are useless. These were far too expensive to break this soon. I will not buy these again, I've had headphones that come with the phone last longer than these did. Very disappointing and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Stay in ear!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for me. They stay in my ear! That's what was most important to me.
customer_reviews.author: sandiego3day

customer_reviews.title: but what I like most is that they don't fall out or lose ...
customer_reviews.text: sound quality of a more expensive earbud, but what I like most is that they don't fall out or lose position while running and dancing. Very light and comfortable. However, I am really writing the review because of the outstanding and responsive customer support, so all around, a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Headphones. They stay in when I run and bike. Only thing I don't like is the controls don't work on my android phone bit I knew they wouldn't when I bought them,so still 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sal S

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on Amazon. I read lots of reviews before making the purchase, but they didn't live up to my expectation. During my gym session yesterday, the left one stopped working -- I honestly thought I went deaf and panicked which was dangerous when you are on a treadmill. Do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: MochiMochi

customer_reviews.title: Catastrophic failure with no warning or recovery.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to report that after only several months of owning these headphones and using them several times a week for running & riding, I plugged them in to my android device for a run and the left one was completely failed. There was no previous indication that there was an emerging issue and once failed, I couldn't induce static or any sound from the failed earbud. Living abroad doesn't leave me with a cost effective option to return them. So I am just out $60.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great fit Terrible sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit terrible sound quality. If you are looking for a bud that says in your ear during running but don't care about sound quality this is a great choice. The earbuds that came with my first iphone sound better then these. Absolute no bass and the volume at the highest point is still pretty low. I have spend 9 dollars n ear buds that sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gans

customer_reviews.title: good packaging. The earphones work quite well
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Fast shipping, good packaging. The earphones work quite well. I prefer to mount them over my ears. They work well for me until my ears get quite sweaty. At that point, the left one falls out readily. I've NEVER found a pair of ear phones that don't have this issue, so I don't hold it against the ear phones.
customer_reviews.author: musselmania

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was good although I am no audiophile
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones August 2014. As of April 2016 they have died. The sound quality was good although I am no audiophile. I mostly used them in the gym while working out. Unfortunately they became tangled easily which was quite annoying. I'd have to unplug them and let the cable spin itself out until it wasn't tangled anymore. They still look like new but for some reason the 3.5mm audio plug has failed and I can no longer hear audio from them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Fortugno

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good and the plugs never fall out of my ears ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good and the plugs never fall out of my ears while running, which was the reason I purchased them. They are not noise cancelling (which doesn't bother me). The sound quality is good but not amazing (again, not that important to me). The clip to stop the cord from flapping about is in a really awkward position when you wear your music device in an armband, and is better designed for running the cord up from your waist. Would be better if the clip's position along the cord could be adjusted or the cord was a tad bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not going to last.
customer_reviews.text: Left earbud is losing its connection after 5 months of use and i take really good care of my things. The earbud cushion has detached in my ear on several occasions. Buttons do not work properly with android. Sound is just ok. Not worth the price. Run away! Edit 4/29: I emailed SOL Republic and they sent me out a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nahra

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and quality characteristics
customer_reviews.text: Have been through multiple pairs of these. Great comfort and quality characteristics. However, I have yet to have a pair last more than a year before they stop working. I have had about 5 pairs of sols and they all quit working within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: they sound very good and stay perfectly secure in your ears while working ...
customer_reviews.text: these are my "go to" headphones when heading to the gym. they sound very good and stay perfectly secure in your ears while working out. they allow for a little bit of ambient noise to leak through as well so that you don't feel totally cut off from the world around you. Solid set of buds for the active type, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jess510

customer_reviews.title: Everything about these headphones is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and durability are great! The clip (that you attach to your clothing, etc.) fell off, and I was bummed about that, but they Sol Republic sent me a brand new pair when I contacted them with my issue! So I came back here to upgrade my review from 4- to 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with these headphones. Great for listening to a podcast while commuting and jamming while working out. Do a very good job of staying in ear without sacrificing sound quality. Does get uncomfortable in my ear after a while, but other earbuds I've had have reached this point much sooner than these.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Runner and Gymers go for it without a second though.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Gyming and it really holding on pretty good. I muse say this I have use loads of other headphones as well, none lasted more then a week or two but this one is well made. Sound quality is pretty good when compared with other headphones on this price list.
customer_reviews.author: Vignesh Babu

customer_reviews.title: Right side stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 months then right side produced no sound. Used them like I've used numerous headphones in the past which have never had such a problem. Definitely will look for another brand for next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: These earphones have been a real disappointment. I use them while cycling every night and they are extremely flat. In addition to having zero bass, the volume buttons do not work with my iPod Touch. I have tried using them with my iPod Nano and, although the controls work, the bass (or lack thereof) is even worse on it because they seem to be underpowered. Their only redeeming feature is tha they generally seem to be good quality and don't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Ramy Khalaf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earphones. Do not cancel sounds which is great for bicycle riding or running in traffic areas
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Sound good and hold up to sweat!
customer_reviews.text: I use these extensively for working out and they have performed up to my expectations. I searched for along time to sweat-proof/resistant earbuds that also sound good. These are fitting the bill. I made custom ear-molds for these and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of use, i was surprised the sound from the left earbud became distorted. The right earbud is perfect. Was so disappointed. I know the price was cheap but its not fair to sell defective item.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Good, but Broke after 4 Months.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked well and were comfortable, but only lasted 4 months of going to the gym. Currently, they are being replaced under a warranty claim (which Sol Republic is slow to respond to). Also, one of the wires after the split turned from white to yellow-ish. If the headphones had continued to work, I would have given the product 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOL Relays-Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best headphones I have purchased. Sound quality is great, stylish, fits snug into ear and comes with earphone mesh case for travel etc, and four(4) earpiece size cover options (not to mention a lifetime of replaceable ones too). Very satisfied with product and would highly recommend as I am an avid runner and workout enthusiast and have not run into a single problem with the Relays. Do not slip even after immense sweating and physical movement. They fit and feel as good as they sound! Very satisfied for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, a bit pricey but amazing for anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, a bit pricey but amazing for anyone who exercises and moves around. They will not fall out unless you take them out. My microphone stopped working by the second week and Amazon replaced it within two days letting me keep the old ones till the new ones arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yen

customer_reviews.title: They come with several different-sized earpieces for a comfortable fit, and the sound is really good for ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these to talk to my girlfriend at night over Skype. They come with several different-sized earpieces for a comfortable fit, and the sound is really good for what these are. The mic delivers clear audio as well. Very glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Strain Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones totally stay in which is great. The buttons on the built in remote don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones totally stay in which is great. The buttons on the built in remote don't all work as expected on a Moto X 2nd Gen. The middle button will stop and start music, but the volume buttons do nothing. Otherwise great! Could just be due to the new model of my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brice E

customer_reviews.title: I really loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I really loved the product, but it stopped working only 3 months. My last pair of headphones (from a different manufacturer) lasted me for a year. While I really loved the performance, I will not buy another pair because I don't know if it will work beyond the 3 months. Very sad, I thought I found an awesome pair of headphones, but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Has good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I have never found a pair of headphones that don't fall out of my ears while I'm running, but here you go. Has good sound quality, cancels a lot of outside noise, which is great for the gym or park, but perhaps not so good in traffic. ***UPDATE: 2 months after I purchased them, the connection in the left ear broke. I've been taking very good care of them. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality - and they stay in place as well as keeping the sweat out.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Better than over the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: My ears are big so fit is a problem. They do hold in the ears but it not a 100% fit. However they do a great job. Sound is great as well. Haven't had any problems on the control like others.
customer_reviews.author: B. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones stay in place!
customer_reviews.text: These provide great sound and actually stay in your ears! Most in this style haven't for me but these things don't budge. Great set of workout headphones.
customer_reviews.author: BDoolit

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for runners
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for in ear headphones to use while running and this fulfill my expectations. When tried it out, they serve their purpose, they do not slip off from my ear while running (like the Sony cheap ones I used to use), the sound quality is astounding, isolating you from the world, the control works pretty well with iGadgets. The headphones came with a little pouch to store them while not using them and different ear plastics to try on and choose the one you're comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Volume buttons on the first pair I ordered did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Volume buttons on the first pair I ordered did not work, so they sent me a new pair in exchange. After 1 1/2 years of moderate use, the right earbud on the second pair has stopped working. During the time they were working they sounded OK, but there was a fair amount of cable noise. Either they're not made well or they're not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-Buy! Don't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Obscenely comfortable to wear and use. Don't remember the last time I handled calls so effectively as the microphone falls just above your shoulder on the left of your face. Volume needs to be cranked a little more than halfway up to experience the good sound it produces. Shuts out ambient noise largely and the buds don't ever fall of. Treat it as robustly you may, nothing happens to it! Super comfortable while running, sweat-proof so far!
customer_reviews.author: Venus Kuiya

customer_reviews.title: ... to take advantage of the volume controls but can fortunately change tracks with a double click of the center ...
customer_reviews.text: I use an android and was knowingly unable to take advantage of the volume controls but can fortunately change tracks with a double click of the center button between them. They came with four size options for the ear pads which are easy to change and the stability and comfort of them during heavy cycling or gym days is what you expect from a highly rated pair. I've had them a couple months so...so far so good
customer_reviews.author: ben dickey

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are really uncomfortable, no matter what tip size I tried, and they constantly slipped out of my ears while running. Once they're sweaty, they're impossible to get back in. Sound is tinny with very little bass. Blocks out ambient sound, but creates a lot of wire noise. Would not recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Sound was terrific until one earbud stop working in less than a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound was terrific until one earbud stop working in less than a month. Great customer service and return policy with Amazon though. Will try another brand..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These earphones have been very disappointing. After around 5 runs, they are already shorting out and I can barely hear my music through them. Earphones advertised for exercise should be able to stand up to far more than that. I would strongly discourage any active people looking for earphones from purchasing these, especially if you sweat a good deal while running or working out. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Nockahoma

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Reviews All Over!
customer_reviews.text: All of the reviews here say these have great sound quality but I felt quite different. I even game them a second chance thinking the first set was a dud. The second was just as bad. Low bass and overall sound quality was much worse than the Apple headphones that come with the iPhone. Fit was good and they are light weight but for $80 I expect to be enjoying the sound quality. Tread cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Failing after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: The volume controls stopped working after only a few (and I mean less than 3 weeks) days of normal use. I bought them to replace the regular apple headphones because the same observed defect, they stop working if you are a runner due to the sweat exposure. I am currently waiting for my replacement, I will update if the new ones fail or not.
customer_reviews.author: senetsomed

customer_reviews.title: These headphones started sounding really tin-y about two months after ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones started sounding really tin-y about two months after I bought them and just a few weeks later one of the buds stopped working entirely. I would have expected a longer life out of these more expensive headphones. When they were working perfectly there was also a lot of wire noise even just from wind or brushing against your clothes. This is the first time the wirecutter has severely let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Boal

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds. They are light and fit perfectly when I am running or biking. My only problem is that the buttons are problematic on a Samsung S6. Don't know if I have a faulty pair or if its a feature.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, don't fall out of my ears while running either
customer_reviews.text: I run long distance with these and they stay in my ears the entire time. I am not a sound quality connoisseur but they sound great to me. I recommend reading the directions so you know how to use the center button to pause, play, go back or forward depending on the amount of times you push it.
customer_reviews.author: John Humble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like them, they seem to get really messed up though with even a little water (sweat).
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and prefect bass!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, and they don't fall out of the ear, If you having problems making the choice of buying the relays. Ill help you out, just buy them you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound for the money and stays in ear
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound for the money and stays in ear, but volume controls cease functioning after a few minutes into each run. I would have returned them but I missed the 30 day return window. The right headphone went out after 8 months. UPDATE: The company has its own one year warranty and offered the best customer service experience I have ever encountered. Problem resolved extremely quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: sounds good. These are SEALED and so you will hear ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, sounds good. These are SEALED and so you will hear your headspace in them. They cut out sound really well, but if you aren't used to them, it will be jarring.
customer_reviews.author: David Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphones because I wanted long lasting good looking headphones. They still look good but sadly they don't work any more. They only lasted me 3 months and I was taking good care of then too. I was expecting better build quality for 60 dollars headphones
customer_reviews.author: Adonis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable wire earbuds I've ever run with!! I had my first pair for almost a year before they gave out and I bought a replacement pair the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked for exactly 11 months and then one earbud stopped producing sound. It is too bad because they were otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: M.webb

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: December '14: Great headphones, perfect for running. Update, August '15: After having the company replace these earbuds 3 times, I really can't recommend them. Go with a brand that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for sweaty exercise
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones for exercise I've ever used. They will stay in place while running and sweating a lot! All others I've used before would slip off my ears and had to adjust them constantly. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Vero Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - that's it
customer_reviews.text: Now these are perfect. Bought for under the mc helmet. PERFECT fit - buds do not stick out too far, great sound and comfort with the medium pads. My search is over. Vendor is super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headphones I have every tried. Designed great and works great. It comes with multiple ear peaces for any size ear canal. The sound is pristine and the pause, advance, etc features work great.
customer_reviews.author: JGS

customer_reviews.title: The low price of perfection. . . Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These buds have a better sound than my stereo speakers. These babies are amazing! I like the blue but I probably should have gotten the standard yellow.
customer_reviews.author: C. Karow

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC RELAYS 1 Button In Ear Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Your life never stops moving, so why should your music? Music is central to everything you do, it fuels you from one moment to the next. RELAYS is the first crossover headphone with patent-pending Free Flex Technology so they won't fall out. From the streets to the trails and the train to the slopes, RELAYS are the first headphones that keep up with you. Patent-pending Free Flex Technology provides a seamless, adaptable fit that's easy to put in and stays put. Enjoy incredible sound with nothing holding you back, so you can go wherever your day takes you. Music control works with most Apple, Android and Windows devices.

BOX CONTAINS
SOL Relays
feature_bullets: 1-button operation, with mic, music and phone control
I5 Sound Engines deliver full sound from a compact design with balance and details that brings out the best in all types of music
With the help of Free Flex technology and a low profile design, RELAYS offer a universal fit that's easy to put in and won't fall out
Lightweight and low profile - fit under a helmet or hat
Sweat- and water-resistant, with a slim-fit carrying case, clip on cable

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
